de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionGeometryOwner, CollisionListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PhysicsEntity, SimpleEntity

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements CollisionListener, CollisionGeometryOwner
    An Entity in the game

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.List<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2> accelerations
      The (physical) acceleration forces (! plural - add new ones with addNewAcceleration() )
      boolean alive
      If this is false the Entity will get removed at the end of the current update cycle
      protected float animationPos 
      java.util.List<EntityCollisionGeometry> collisionGeometries
      Here are the collisionBoxes of this Entity stores **DO NOT ALTER** Use the methods addCollisionGeo() / removeCollisionGeo() / listCollisionGeometries
      CollisionGeometryListWrapper collisionGeometriesWrapper
      This is not an "real" list - its only a convenient wrapper around collisionGeometries.
      CollisionMap collisionOwner
      The collision map - is set by the GameLayer when this Entity is added to it
      protected boolean isAnimationPaused 
      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 speed
      The (physical) speed
      int zlayer
      The Z position of this entity.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EntityCollisionGeometry addCollisionGeo(float relativeX, float relativeY, CollisionGeometry geo)
      Adds a new CollisionGeometry to this entity [ATTENTION] The relative Coordinates are relative to the CENTER of the geometry Geometry are positioned via their center Entities are positioned via their bottom-left corner
      EntityCollisionGeometry addFullCollisionBox()
      Add a collisionBox the size of this Entity
      EntityCollisionGeometry addFullCollisionCircle()
      Add a collisionBox the size of this Entity
      EntityCollisionGeometry addFullCollisionTriangle(AlignCorner4 align)
      Add a collisionBox the size of this Entity
      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 addNewAcceleration()
      Gets a new force (= acceleration) to use with this Entity
      abstract void beforeUpdate(float delta)
      Update the Entity (called before normal update actions)

      Get the boundary box
      float getCenterX()
      Get the center X position
      float getCenterY()
      Get the center Y position
      java.util.Set<CollisionGeometry> getColliders()
      Returns all geometries that collide with this one
      CollisionGeometry getFirstCollider()
      Returns the first other geometry found that collides with this one
      CollisionGeometry getFirstHardCollider()
      Returns the first other geometry found that collides with this one so that they can't move into each other (collide hard)
      float getHeight()
      Get the height
      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getMiddle()
      Gets the middle
      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getPosition()
      Get the position as an Vector (must create a new Vector instance)
      float getPositionRightX()
      Get the X - right position
      float getPositionTopY()
      Get the Y - top position

      Get the X - bottom position

      Get the Y - left position

      Get the acceleration including - the gravitational force
      com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion getTexture()
      Gets the current texture - the return value can change every cycle, don't cache this
      float getTextureRotation()
      Get the current clockwise rotation (of the texture) in degree.
      float getTextureScaleX()
      Get the current X scale (of the texture).

      Get the current X scale (of the texture).

      Get the width

      If the Entity is animated

      Returns if the entity is colliding with any other

      Returns if the entity is colliding with any other thatcan't move into each other

      Return is one of the geometries is hard colliding (not direct - only touching) with an other geometry on the EAST side

      Return is one of the geometries is hard colliding (not direct - only touching) with an other geometry on the NORTH side

      Return is one of the geometries is hard colliding (not direct - only touching) with an other geometry on the SOUTH side
      boolean isTouchingTop() 
      boolean isTouchingWest()
      Return is one of the geometries is hard colliding (not direct - only touching) with an other geometry on the WEST side
      ReadOnlyEntityCollisionGeometryListIterator listCollisionGeometries()
      An ListIterator to iterate through all Geometries The returned Iterator is read only (!)
      boolean movePosition(float dx, float dy)
      Moved the Entity by a specific delta value This method respects collisions and does not move Entities into each other
      abstract void onLayerAdd(GameLayer layer)
      This method is called when the Entity is added to a GameLayer
      void onPointerDown()
      Called when the "POINTER-DOWN event" happens on this entity Feel free to override and use the event
      void onPointerUp()
      Called when the "POINTER-UP event" happens on this entity Feel free to override and use the event

      Pauses / un-pauses an Animation

      Remove all Collision Geometries associated with this Entity

      Remove a specific with this Entity associated Geometry You get the EntityCollisionGeometry Object when adding the Geometry

      Changes the position of this entity

      • animationPos

        protected float animationPos

      • isAnimationPaused

        protected boolean isAnimationPaused

      • accelerations

        public java.util.List<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2> accelerations
        The (physical) acceleration forces (! plural - add new ones with addNewAcceleration() )

      • speed

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 speed
        The (physical) speed

      • alive

        public boolean alive
        If this is false the Entity will get removed at the end of the current update cycle

      • collisionGeometries

        public final java.util.List<EntityCollisionGeometry> collisionGeometries
        Here are the collisionBoxes of this Entity stores **DO NOT ALTER** Use the methods addCollisionGeo() / removeCollisionGeo() / listCollisionGeometries

      • collisionGeometriesWrapper

        public final CollisionGeometryListWrapper collisionGeometriesWrapper
        This is not an "real" list - its only a convenient wrapper around collisionGeometries. (do NOT try to alter this list)

      • zlayer

        public int zlayer
        The Z position of this entity. Greater z indices are on top of lower indices If two entities have the same z position, the last-added entity is rendered on top.

      • collisionOwner

        public CollisionMap collisionOwner
        The collision map - is set by the GameLayer when this Entity is added to it

        Parameters:

        animationDuration - The duration for one *full* cycle (all frames)

        h - the boundary box height

      • listCollisionGeometries

      • addCollisionGeo

        public EntityCollisionGeometry addCollisionGeo(float relativeX,
                                      float relativeY,
                                      CollisionGeometry geo)
        Adds a new CollisionGeometry to this entity [ATTENTION] The relative Coordinates are relative to the CENTER of the geometry Geometry are positioned via their center Entities are positioned via their bottom-left corner
        Parameters:
        relativeX - the x position of the Geometry relative to this Entity
        relativeY - the y position of the Geometry relative to this Entity
        geo - the geometry
        Returns:
        A wrapper object - needed to remove the geometry again

      • addFullCollisionBox

        public EntityCollisionGeometry addFullCollisionBox()
        Add a collisionBox the size of this Entity
        Returns:
        A wrapper object - needed to remove the geometry again

      • addFullCollisionCircle

        Add a collisionBox the size of this Entity
        Returns:
        A wrapper object - needed to remove the geometry again

      • addFullCollisionTriangle

        public EntityCollisionGeometry addFullCollisionTriangle(AlignCorner4 align)
        Add a collisionBox the size of this Entity
        Parameters:
        align - the edge which will _not_ be included in the triangle
        Returns:
        A wrapper object - needed to remove the geometry again

      • removeAllCollisionGeos

        public boolean removeAllCollisionGeos()
        Remove all Collision Geometries associated with this Entity
        Returns:
        true if successful

        public boolean removeCollisionGeo(EntityCollisionGeometry ecg)

        Parameters:
        ecg - the to remove geometry
        Returns:
        true is successful

        the first colliding geometry or null

        true if it is touching another geometry on the TOP side
        See Also:
        (= "is the Entity hitting its head on the ceiling")

        public boolean isTouchingNorth()

        true if it is touching another geometry on the NORTH side
